accounts.name: Connect Safely
accounts.description: A nonprofit organization dedicated to educating users of connected technology about safety, privacy, and security.

accounts.name: Cyberbullying Research Center
accounts.description: Provides up-to-date information about the nature, extent, causes, and consequences of cyberbullying.

accounts.name: Safe Kids
accounts.description: Practical advice for raising children in the digital age with a focus on online safety.

accounts.name: Family Online Safety Institute
accounts.description: International nonprofit organization working to make the online world safer for kids and their families.

accounts.name: Net Family News
accounts.description: A forum for participatory media, digital citizenship, and online safety for parents and educators.
